annotation: <history><entry><input>ssh user@debian-vm</input><output>Welcome to Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye)</output><annotation>Connecting to a Debian 11 virtual machine via SSH.</annotation></entry><entry><input>uptime</input><output> 12:34:56 up 1 day,  3:22,  2 users,  load average: 0.12, 0.13, 0.09</output><annotation>Checking the system uptime with the `uptime` command.</annotation></entry><entry><input>sudo apt update</input><output>Get:1 http://deb.debian.org/debian bullseye InRelease [116 kB] ... Fetched 116 kB in 1s (210 kB/s) Reading package lists... Done</output><annotation>Updating the package index using `apt update`.</annotation></entry><entry><input>sudo apt install -y python3-pip</input><output>Reading package lists... Done Building dependency tree Reading state information... Done The following additional packages will be installed: python3-setuptools python3-wheel</output><annotation>Installing `python3-pip` to manage Python packages.</annotation></entry><entry><input>pip3 --version</input><output>pip 22.3.1 from /usr/lib/python3.9/site-packages/pip (python 3.9)</output><annotation>Verifying the installation of `pip3` by checking its version.</annotation></entry><entry><input>sudo apt install -y git</input><output>Reading package lists... Done Building dependency tree Reading state information... Done The following additional packages will be installed: git-man libc6-dev</output><annotation>Installing `git` using `apt`.</annotation></entry><entry><input>git --version</input><output>git version 2.30.2</output><annotation>Verifying the installation of `git` by checking its version.</annotation></entry><entry><input>curl https://www.example.com</input><output>curl: (6) Could not resolve host: www.example.com</output><annotation>Attempting to access a website with `curl`, encountering a DNS resolution error.</annotation></entry><entry><input>sudo systemctl restart systemd-resolved</input><output></output><annotation>Restarting the DNS resolver service to address the DNS issue.</annotation></entry><entry><input>curl https://www.example.com</input><output><!doctype html> ...</output><annotation>Successfully accessing the website with `curl` after restarting the DNS service.</annotation></entry><entry><input>exit</input><output></output><annotation>Exiting the SSH session after completing the tasks.</annotation></entry></history>
